topdown

Class Handler

  • java.lang.Object
    • topdown.Handler

  • public class Handler
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used to keep track of all GameObjects and hold their unique properties.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Isaac Jimenez, Nicholas English, Suman Gurung
